productText:
000
FZAK51 PAFC 151145
CWFAER

Coastal Waters Forecast
National Weather Service Anchorage Alaska
345 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023

Coastal Waters Forecast for the Northern Gulf of Alaska Coast
up to 100 nm out including Kodiak Island and Cook Inlet.

Wind forecasts reflect the predominant speed and direction
expected. Sea forecasts represent an average of the highest
one-third of the combined wind wave and swell height.

PKZ197-160045-
345 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023
.SYNOPSIS FOR THE NORTH GULF COAST+KODIAK ISLAND WATERS+
COOK INLET...

A 993 mb low 230 nm southwest of Kodiak City moves 130 nm south 
of Middleton Island at 990 mb Fri morning. The low remains nearly 
stationary as it weakens to 1000 mb by Sat morning.

$$
